name: arcandtonic.technology
description: example arc.codes app with auth and data persistence on the backend hosting a PWA powered by tonic.technology
author: Fil Maj <me@filmaj.ca>

scripts.build: npx components public/js/tonic-components.mjs && sed -i.bak 's/module.exports =/export default/' public/js/tonic-components.mjs && rm public/js/tonic-components.mjs.bak && cp node_modules/@conductorlab/components/theme.css public/css/tonic.css
